snippet.title: I Made a Black British Video Game.
snippet.description:
and here's the trailer
//NIXIE - Black August Trailer
It's been a while since I've updated my subscribers on how game development has been going. The official title for this trailer is the Black August Trailer, but the algorithm is a confusing one. 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Want to support a Black British Game Dev?
► TWITTER: https://x.com/NIXIE_Game/
►  PATREON: https://patreon.com/thesoulminded
►  KO-FI: https://ko-fi.com/thesoulminded
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Even if you can't donate any money, share the game to people you know. I want more people to know that this is happening, and I'm not exactly the marketing guy. 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
SUPPORT THE FOODBANK!
► TWITTER: https://x.com/FreeHueyFood
► Bi-monthly foodbank initiative! Been writing a book about the British Black Panthers too which I'm planning on talking about more on here. Watch this space. Support if you can!
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Shoot me a shout:
► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/TheSoulMinded
►  INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/thesoulminded/
I mean, I'm just me man lol. 

I'll be dropping a video soon talking more about development and plans for the end of the year. Apologies for the delay on putting out videos, got some stuff in store soon.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Music done by @Cxldr3 
Pixel Art: https://x.com/mizartz
Backgrounds: https://x.com/Grandero_Pixels
Story Art: https://x.com/XscapistLJ
Character Designs: 
https://x.com/Freemechanism
https://x.com/mudavaye
https://x.com/PKSosa
Game Cover/Key Visual Art:
https://x.com/MillieFangs

Directed, Programmed and Written by moi.
